text: yeah it seems that there aren't any results being returned from that portal no matter the search, yet your other portal does not have that issue. Going to look into why

Hey guys, we just added in the `blog_post_override` parameter to manually include blog posts in the results by id. Here's the documentation that includes it: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-tags#blog-related-posts>. Let me know if you have any questions/issues :thumbsup:
<@UBW8W4V3J> see above, you should be able to use this now to create a featured posts section and pull in specific blogs.
This should be fixed now, let me know if the issue still persists
